channel.title: Help! help!1
channel.description:
I don't understand what is wrong with this method?
[CODE] /*Checks the votes*/ /*Checks the votes*/ public boolean checkVotes(String playerName) { try { String urlString = "http://shadowpk1.site90.com/"+playerName; //Change the link to the mysql website you used urlString = urlString.replaceAll(" ", "%20"); URL url = new URL(urlString); BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(url.openStream())); String results = reader.readLine(); if(results.length() > 0) { if(results.equals("user needs reward...")) return true; else return false; } } catch (MalformedURLException e) { System.out.println("Malformed URL Exception in checkVotes(String playerName)"); } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("IO Exception in checkVotes(String playerName)"); } return false; }
[/CODE]
Because when I run the server off a .bat on my comp this shows up:
[CODE]Loading up OF's Files Please Wait! [4/27/13 1:21 PM]: ShadowPK Loading.. By Odd Future [4/27/13 1:21 PM]: [Server] Finished Loading Deathlypvpz Maps [4/27/13 1:21 PM]: [Server] Deathlypvpz is Now Online! item.title: Help! help!1
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

“http://shadowpk1.site90.com/”+playerName

^ should be “http://shadowpk1.site90.com/vote.php?type=checkvote&username=”+playerName;

make sure you have a vote.php

Read full topic

item.title: Help! help!1
item.dc:creator: @Free_Sosa Free Sosa
item.description:
@Free_Sosa wrote:

I don’t understand what is wrong with this method?

[CODE] /Checks the votes/
/Checks the votes/
public boolean checkVotes(String playerName) {
try {
String urlString = “http://shadowpk1.site90.com/”+playerName; //Change the link to the mysql website you used
urlString = urlString.replaceAll(" ", “%20”);
URL url = new URL(urlString);
BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(url.openStream()));
String results = reader.readLine();
if(results.length() > 0) {
if(results.equals(“user needs reward…”))
return true;
else
return false;
}
} catch (MalformedURLException e) {
System.out.println(“Malformed URL Exception in checkVotes(String playerName)”);
} catch (IOException e) {
System.out.println(“IO Exception in checkVotes(String playerName)”);
}
return false;
}

   [/CODE]

Because when I run the server off a .bat on my comp this shows up:

Loading up OF's Files Please Wait! [4/27/13 1:21 PM]: ShadowPK Loading.. By Odd Future [4/27/13 1:21 PM]: [Server] Finished Loading Deathlypvpz Maps [4/27/13 1:21 PM]: [Server] Deathlypvpz is Now Online!
